screenshots.caption: Easy yet efficient editor - all controls are straightforward.

name: Source CFG Edit
short_description:
This tiny, efficient, yet powerful tool will help the user to edit Source Engine configurations for Xbox 360 games.

Coded in Java with cross-platform compatibility.
summary: Easily edit source engine configuration files, made esp. for X360 user
